avallecam 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

distance tibble

get_distance_m.Rd

distance tibble

get_distance_m(set1_lat, set1_lon, set2_lat, set2_lon)

Arguments

set1_lat

set1 of latitude coordinates
set1_lon

set1 of longitude coordinates
set2_lat

set2 of latitude coordinates
set2_lon

set2 of longitude coordinates

Value

distance as double vector

Functions

  • get_distance_m: generates a distance output between two set of points within a tibble and flexible with group_by and purrr::pmap

Examples


library(tidyverse)
library(geosphere)
library(purrr)
library(avallecam)

d <- tibble(run = c(rep(1,6), rep(2,6)),
            grp = c(rep("a",3),rep("b",3),rep("a",3),rep("b",3)),
            lat = rep(c(57.15508, 52.41283, 57.15521,
                        52.41278, 57.14520, 52.41317),2),
            lon = rep(c(-2.07887, -4.07806, -2.07886,
                        -4.07803, -2.07886, -4.07858),2)) %>% print()
#> # A tibble: 12 x 4
#>      run grp     lat   lon
#>    <dbl> <chr> <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1     1 a      57.2 -2.08
#>  2     1 a      52.4 -4.08
#>  3     1 a      57.2 -2.08
#>  4     1 b      52.4 -4.08
#>  5     1 b      57.1 -2.08
#>  6     1 b      52.4 -4.08
#>  7     2 a      57.2 -2.08
#>  8     2 a      52.4 -4.08
#>  9     2 a      57.2 -2.08
#> 10     2 b      52.4 -4.08
#> 11     2 b      57.1 -2.08
#> 12     2 b      52.4 -4.08
#test
d %>%
  group_by(run,grp) %>%
  mutate(dist=pmap_dbl(list(lat,lon,lag(lat),lag(lon)),get_distance_m))
#> # A tibble: 12 x 5
#> # Groups:   run, grp [4]
#>      run grp     lat   lon    dist
#>    <dbl> <chr> <dbl> <dbl>   <dbl>
#>  1     1 a      57.2 -2.08     NA 
#>  2     1 a      52.4 -4.08 543285.
#>  3     1 a      57.2 -2.08 543300.
#>  4     1 b      52.4 -4.08     NA 
#>  5     1 b      57.1 -2.08 542225.
#>  6     1 b      52.4 -4.08 542192.
#>  7     2 a      57.2 -2.08     NA 
#>  8     2 a      52.4 -4.08 543285.
#>  9     2 a      57.2 -2.08 543300.
#> 10     2 b      52.4 -4.08     NA 
#> 11     2 b      57.1 -2.08 542225.
#> 12     2 b      52.4 -4.08 542192.
